52 struct RenderFrameState {
53  enum RenderStage {
54  kDepthPrepass,
55  kShadowMapping,
56  kRender
57  };
58 
59  enum RenderActionFlag {
60  kResize = 1 << 0 // Window was resized during this frame
61  };
62 
63  bool playModeChanged() const {
64  return m_playMode != m_previousPlayMode;
65  }
66 
67  bool resized() const {
68  return m_actionFlags.testFlag(kResize);
69  }
70 
71  SortKey m_lastRenderedKey;
72  AbstractCamera* m_camera = nullptr;
73  ShaderProgram* m_shaderProgram = nullptr;
74  RenderStage m_stage = kDepthPrepass;
75  QFlags<RenderActionFlag> m_actionFlags;
76  int m_previousPlayMode = -1;
77  int m_playMode = -2;
78 };
79 
80 
86 class MainRenderer: Object, protected GL::OpenGLFunctions {
87 public:
88  //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
91 
92  enum LightingMode {
93  kForward, // Most basic
94  kDeferred // TODO: More complicated, deferred rendering!
95  };
96 
97  // Tiled forward shading is sometimes also referred to as Forward+
98  // See: http://www.aortiz.me/2018/12/21/CG.html#tiled-shading--forward
99 
100  // For forward depth pass, need to be able to preserve glPosition as well as discards in frag shader,
101  // while minimizing performance impact of the shader. Right now, the same shader is used
102  // for both passes, which is not great
103  enum LightingFlag {
104  kClustered = 1 << 0, // Perform light-culling using clustered approach
105  kDepthPrePass = 1 << 1, // FIXME: TODO: Simplify pre-pass so that actually helps performance
106  kDynamicShadows = 1 << 2, // Whether or not to allow shadow casting
107  kSSAO = 1 << 3 // Whether or not to perform SSAO
108  };
109 
111 
112  //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
115 
116  MainRenderer(rev::CoreEngine* engine, View::GLWidget* widget);
117  ~MainRenderer();
118

126

128  const View::GLWidget* widget() const { return m_widget; }
129

131  return m_drawMutex;
132  }
133
